directions: Beat Cheddar cheese, cream cheese, sherry, curry powder, and salt together in a bowl; spread onto a serving platter into a 1/2-inch layer. Cover platter with plastic wrap and refrigerate until firm, about 30 minutes.
Spread chutney over cheese layer and top with green onion.
ingredients: 1 (8 ounce) jar mango chutney, finely chopped
title: Curry Pate
